title: Jordan
description: Jordan Sommerville was a healer of helpless animals, rescuer of strays, a man who could seduce a woman with his voice alone. Yet hedidn't use that power often. His brothers kidded that he was holding out for a paragon of virtue and not many in Buckhorn qualified. But then he met Georgia, and broke all his own rules.Georgia Barnes supported herself and her kids as a danceran exotic dancer. If Jordan Sommerville didn't like it, he could take a hike. So what if he was the most caring, gentle, desirable man she'd ever knownhe was still a man like all the rest. Surely he couldn't be as perfect as he lookedor could he?"
author: Lori Foster
